title: Cashmere
description: An intense, unplanned ménage à trois throws the controlled lives of two of the people into chaos. Join Laura and Dan as they react to the surging lust and passion their relationship releases. Can love happen so soon? Can it be believed in?Become them on their roller coaster ride of lust and love...and loss. They, and you, will be forever changed...Set on and near the beautiful beaches north of Sydney, Australia, Cashmere is the latest story of deep, loving intimacy from the pen of Khul Waters.
author: Khul Waters
